verbs.description: The Trump administration 's cancellation of the DACA program [V: could] cost the U.S. economy more than $ 400 billion over the next 10 years .
[ARG1: The Trump administration 's cancellation of the DACA program] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: cost] [ARG3: the U.S. economy] [ARG2: more than $ 400 billion] [ARGM-TMP: over the next 10 years] .
